title: Devils Postpile National Monument: Park Statistics
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Park Statistics              Park Statistics       FAST FACTS Established: July 6, 1911 Designation: National Monument Size: 798 acres Wilderness: 747 acres (Ansel Adams Wilderness) Elevation: 7,560 feet above sea level (at the Ranger Station) Average Annual Visitation (last 4 years): 103,258 Miles of Trails: 8 Closest town: Mammoth Lakes, CA
